A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointing - I felt JJ Abraham’s revived the franchise spectacularly from the damage of the prequals with Force Awakens but Rian Johnson some how made this film feel like the prequals. Some of the decisions might have seemed interesting on paper but it didn’t translate to the screen. Some of the comedy spat in the face of the fan base and was out of place in this series. There are of course some omg moments but there wasn’t enough of an expelenation of why or how. There was a necessary gravitas from Mark Hamills performance that was missing. This is Luke Skywalker in self banishment. A little seriousness and weight would be great. Luke just came off as an uncle who missed a few Christmas dinners..
